title: "Monash University and RMIT develop AI and AR device to read emotional cues"
excerpt: "Monash University and the Royal Melbourne Institute of Technology (RMIT) have jointly designed an artificial intelligence (AI) and augmented reality (AR) device they say can read and recognise emotional cues that could potentially be used to combat mental health disorders,"
